Serialized Form

Package org.magelan.core

Class org.magelan.core.Block extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 7810317227474233984L

Serialization Methods

readObject

private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Reads object's fields from the ObjectInputStream.

The method will first read the serialization version identifier and try to deserialize accordingly.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - in case of I/O error
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - error instantiating the serialized class

writeObject

private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Writes object's fields to the ObjectOutputStream. Provided to avoid storing of unnecessary fields such as modifiers and fields that cannot be serialized (for example AlphaComposite).

The methods will also attempt to optimize the data written to the stream and reduce its size. For example double fields will be serialized as floats; some fields will be omitted, if possible.

The method will first write one byte containing bit-coded information, regarding the serialized data.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - in case of I/O error
Serialized Fields

name

java.lang.String name
Name of the block, unique to the drawing it is defined in.

entities

java.util.List<E> entities
List of block's entities with coordinates in block's coordinate system.

path

java.awt.geom.GeneralPath path
A path of all block entities.

Class org.magelan.core.style.DefaultTextStyle extends AbstractNamedStyle implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 5439104325900805851L

Serialization Methods

readObject

private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Reads object's fields from the ObjectInputStream.

The method will first read the serialization version identifier and try to deserialize accordingly.

Throws:
IOException - in case of I/O error
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - error instantiating the serialized class

writeObject

private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Writes object's fields to the ObjectOutputStream. Provided to avoid storing of unnecessary fields such as modifiers and fields that cannot be serialized (for example AlphaComposite.

The methods will also attempt to optimize the data written to the stream and reduce its size. For example double fields will be serialized as floats; some fields will be omitted, if possible.

Throws:
IOException - in case of I/O error
